function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient ventilation leading to loss of productivity","Impact":"Substantial loss of productivity","Mitigation":"Implementation of high-quality ventilation and air-conditioning systems","Technologies":"High-quality ventilation and air-conditioning systems","People":"Occupants of the office building","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Impact of poor indoor climate on health and productivity","Impact":"Negative impact on health and productivity","Mitigation":"Improvement in the quality of indoor climate, including ventilation and air-conditioning systems","Technologies":"Quality improvements in indoor climate systems","People":"Occupants of the office building","Owner":"Building management"}]}
